description: Outcome tables for routine activities. Weights determine probability, rewards vary by outcome quality.

excellent: Perfect alignment. The sergeant nods approval.
Sharp drill. Officers took notice.
Crisp movements. Best formation in the company.
good: Good showing. You kept pace well.
Steady drill. The sergeant seemed satisfied.
poor: Sloppy. The sergeant's eye lingered on you.
Out of step. Drew a few looks.
Distracted. Barely kept up.
mishap: Stumbled during drill. Earned extra duty.
Wrong turn. Made the whole line look bad.
Dropped your weapon. The sergeant's face said it all.

excellent: Sharp focus today. Movements feel natural.
Everything clicked. A veteran watched approvingly.
Best session in weeks. The muscle memory is building.
good: Solid session. The drills are paying off.
Strong work. Sword arm feels sure.
poor: Distracted. Sergeant noticed.
Sluggish today. The heat didn't help.
Off rhythm. Need to focus.
mishap: Twisted ankle during drill.
Training partner's swing caught you wrong.
Overextended. Pulled something.

excellent: Found a forgotten pouch while digging latrines.
Efficient work. Finished early, earned coin.
Good haul. Extra supplies discovered.
good: Honest work done. Muscles ache, but satisfied.
Solid effort. Quota met ahead of time.
poor: Slow progress. Extra hours needed.
Struggled with the work. Exhausted.
Behind quota. Not your best day.
mishap: Dropped a supply crate. Something broke.
Tool slipped. Cut your hand.
Back gave out. Need rest.

excellent: Good stories around the fire. Spirits high.
Made new friends. The ale flowed freely.
Laughter and camaraderie. Good for the soul.
normal: Time with the lads. Nothing special.
poor: Kept to yourself. Not feeling social.
Arguments in camp. Tension in the air.
Awkward evening. Better to have stayed away.
mishap: Drinking contest gone wrong. Feeling terrible.
Said the wrong thing. Made enemies.
Fight broke out. You're involved now.

excellent: Sharp dealing. Came out well ahead.
Good trades. Coin purse is heavier.
Shrewd bargaining. Made real profit.
good: Decent dealing. Nothing lost, something gained.
poor: Bad deals. Should have walked away.
Cheated by a merchant. Lesson learned.
Lost out on trades. Not your day.
mishap: Gambling debt. Lost more than you should.
Scammed. Purse is lighter.
Dice weren't kind. Significant losses.

excellent: Deep, restful sleep. Feel renewed.
Best rest in weeks. Ready for anything.
Woke refreshed. Body and mind restored.
normal: Adequate rest. Morning comes too soon.
poor: Restless night. Noise kept you awake.
Couldn't settle. Mind racing.
Poor sleep. Still tired.
mishap: Nightmares. Woke in cold sweat.
Illness stirring. Stomach troubles.
Couldn't sleep at all. Exhausted.

excellent: Excellent foraging. Found fresh game and wild vegetables.
Good hunting grounds discovered. Brought back plenty.
Rich pickings today. Supplies significantly boosted.
good: Found good resources. Worth the effort.
normal: Standard foraging run. Some supplies gathered.
Returned with what we could find.
poor: Slim pickings. Land is picked over.
Long hours for little result.
Barely found anything. Disappointing.
mishap: Got lost. Returned late and empty-handed.
Injured by thorns. Had to abandon search.
Ran into trouble. Lucky to get back.

excellent: Sharp patrol. Spotted potential threat early. Reported to command.
Found abandoned supplies on route. Good haul.
Excellent observation. Noticed things others missed.
good: Solid patrol duty. Nothing slipped by.
poor: Distracted on patrol. Sergeant noticed.
Nearly missed a checkpoint. Close call.
Sloppy patrol. Need to stay alert.
mishap: Got turned around. Reported late.
Fell into a ditch. Twisted something.
Almost walked into an ambush. Lucky escape.

excellent: Full day of rest. Completely recovered.
Sergeant granted easy duty. Feel like a new man.
Real rest at last. Ready for anything.
poor: Rest interrupted. Still tired.
Couldn't fully relax. Worries persist.
Rest period cut short. Not enough.
mishap: Called for duty during rest. Frustrated.
Rest disturbed. Feel worse than before.
No real rest. Something always needed.

excellent: Intense drill. Pushed through. Ready for anything.
Emergency readiness achieved. The company is sharp.
Hard training pays off. Reflexes are razor-sharp.
good: Hard work but worth it. More prepared now.
poor: Struggled with the pace. Barely kept up.
Emergency drill was rough. Exhausted.
Not ready. Need more practice.
mishap: Injured during drill. Too intense.
Pushed too hard. Something gave.
Collapsed from exhaustion. Carried back.

excellent: Easy day. Spirits lifted across the company.
Light duty and good company. Morale soaring.
Relaxed atmosphere. The men needed this.
good: Easy duties today. Good for morale.
normal: Not much expected today. Fine with that.
poor: Even light duty felt like a chore.
Still grumbling despite easy work.
Low energy even with light duties.
mishap: Arguments despite easy day. Tensions high.
Light duty interrupted by crisis.
Couldn't enjoy the break. Worries mount.
